verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David.) Do you <S%H552>indeed<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> O <S%H410>gods<s%>? Do you <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H4339>uprightly,<s%> O <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>?
<S%H637>No,<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> you <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H9390>unrighteousness;<s%> On <S%H776>earth<s%> you <S%H6424>weigh<s%> out the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from the <S%H7358>womb;<s%> These who <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> <S%H8582>go<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> from <S%H990>birth.<s%>

They have <S%H2534>venom<s%> <S%H1823>like<s%> the <S%H2534>venom<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> <S%H3644>Like<s%> a <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H6620>cobra<s%> that <S%H331>stops<s%> up its <S%H241>ear,<s%>
<S%H834>So<s%> that it does not <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3907>charmers,<s%> [Or] a <S%H2449>skillful<s%> <S%H2266>caster<s%> of <S%H2267>spells.<s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2040>shatter<s%> their <S%H8127>teeth<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> <S%H5422>Break<s%> out the <S%H4973>fangs<s%> of the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Let them <S%H9242>flow<s%> away <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that <S%H1980>runs<s%> <S%H1980>off;<s%> [When] he <S%H1869>aims<s%> his <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> let them be as <S%H9269>headless<s%> <S%H4135>shafts.<s%>

[Let them be] as a <S%H7642>snail<s%> which <S%H8557>melts<s%> <S%H8557>away<s%> as it <S%H1980>goes<s%> along, [Like] the <S%H5309>miscarriages<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> which <S%H1077>never<s%> <S%H2372>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

<S%H2962>Before<s%> your <S%H5518>pots<s%> can <S%H995>feel<s%> [the fire of] <S%H329>thorns,<s%> He will <S%H9621>sweep<s%> them <S%H9621>away<s%> with a <S%H9621>whirlwind,<s%> the <S%H2416>green<s%> and the <S%H2740>burning<s%> <S%H3644>alike.<s%>

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H2372>sees<s%> the <S%H5359>vengeance;<s%> He will <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H6471>feet<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

And <S%H120>men<s%> will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H389>"Surely<s%> there is a <S%H6529>reward<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is a <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H8199>judges<s%> on <S%H776>earth!<s%>"
